name: pfapack

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A library for numerically computing the Pfaffian of a real or complex
skew-symmetric matrix. This is based on computing the tridiagonal form
of the matrix under unitary congruence transformations.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
NVPL BLAS (NVIDIA Performance Libraries BLAS) is part of NVIDIA
Performance Libraries that provides standard Fortran 77 BLAS APIs as
well as C (CBLAS).

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
libflame is a portable library for dense matrix computations, providing
much of the functionality present in LAPACK, developed by current and
former members of the Science of High-Performance Computing (SHPC) group
in the Institute for Computational Engineering and Sciences at The
University of Texas at Austin. libflame includes a compatibility layer,
lapack2flame, which includes a complete LAPACK implementation.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
